<!-- wp:etch/text {"metadata":{"name":"Text"},"content":"\u003c!-- wp:etch/raw-html {\u0022content\u0022:\u0022nfunction wrapHeadingLines() {n    const headings = document.querySelectorAll('[data-heading]');nn    headings.forEach(heading =\u003e {n        // Get the computed styles of the headingn        const computedStyle = window.getComputedStyle(heading);n        const headingWidth = heading.offsetWidth;nn        // Create a hidden element for measuringn        const measure = document.createElement('span');n        measure.style.cssText = `n            position: absolute;n            visibility: hidden;n            white-space: nowrap;n            font: ${computedStyle.font};n        `;n        document.body.appendChild(measure);nn        // Get the text content and preserve all spacesn        const text = heading.textContent;n        const words = text.split(/(\u005cs+)/); // Split into words AND spaces to preserve spacingn        let lines = [];n        let currentLine = [];nn        // Build lines word by wordn        words.forEach(word =\u003e {n            measure.textContent = currentLine.join('') + word; // Join without adding extra spacesnn            if (measure.offsetWidth \u003e headingWidth \u0026\u0026 currentLine.length \u003e 0) {n                lines.push(currentLine.join('')); // Push the current linen                currentLine = [word]; // Start a new linen            } else {n                currentLine.push(word); // Add the word to the current linen            }n        });nn        // Add the last linen        if (currentLine.length \u003e 0) {n            lines.push(currentLine.join(''));n        }nn        // Remove measuring elementn        document.body.removeChild(measure);nn        // Replace heading content with wrapped linesn        heading.innerHTML = linesn            .map(line =\u003e `${line}`)n            .join('');n    });n}nn// Run on load and resizendocument.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', wrapHeadingLines);nlet resizeTimer;nwindow.addEventListener('resize', () =\u003e {n    clearTimeout(resizeTimer);n    resizeTimer = setTimeout(wrapHeadingLines, 250);n});\u0022,\u0022unsafe\u0022:\u0022true\u0022} --\u003e\n"} /-->
